abstract: Buyers were greeted with error messages on the Web sites of Apple and AT&T, where many reported difficulty retrieving their customer data.
snippet: Buyers were greeted with error messages on the Web sites of Apple and AT&T, where many reported difficulty retrieving their customer data.
lead_paragraph: Apple fans who were already unhappy with AT&T, the exclusive carrier for the iPhone in the United States, got another reason to complain about it on Tuesday when Apple and its partners began taking orders for the new iPhone 4.

headline.main: Errors Mar Initial Sales of iPhone 4
headline.print_headline: Error Messages on Web Sites of Apple and AT&T Mar Initial Sales of the  iPhone 4

abstract: AT&T said presale orders for the iPhone 4 were 10 times higher than they were for the previous version of the iPhone.
snippet: AT&T said presale orders for the iPhone 4 were 10 times higher than they were for the previous version of the iPhone.
lead_paragraph: Apple said on Wednesday that it and its partners took more than 600,000 orders on Tuesday for its new iPhone 4, which will be released next week. AT&T, its wireless partner in the United States, said it was suspending preorders for the phone.

headline.main: Apple Gets More Than 600,000 Orders for iPhone 4
